ResourceHeader.ResourceName: JUICE - Jovian Magnetic Field Models - JRM33 + Con2020 M-Shell - CReMa 5.1
ResourceHeader.Description: JUICE M-Shell calculated with JRM33+CON2020 between 2031-07-01 and 2034-12-31 using Crema 5.1 positions. Spatial resolution is 1/250Rj ~ 300 km. Outer boundary is set to R = 40 Rj.

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thank you for acknowledging the use of AMDA in publications with wording like "Data analysis was performed with the AMDA science analysis system provided by the Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas (CDPP) supported by CNRS, CNES, Observatoire de Paris and Université Paul Sabatier, Toulouse". See the Rules of the road at https://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html . Please acknowledge the Data Providers.

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA Web application
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data via CDPP/AMDA Web application.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thank you for acknowledging the use of AMDA in publications with wording like "Data analysis was performed with the AMDA science analysis system provided by the Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas (CDPP) supported by CNRS, CNES, Observatoire de Paris and Université Paul Sabatier, Toulouse". See the Rules of the road at https://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html . Please acknowledge the Data Providers.

NumericalData.Caveats: Due to the limitation in the spatial resolution used for the computation, small stalls in M-Shell colatitude, longitude and curvilinear distance may occasionally occur close to the magnetic equator

Parameter.Name: M-Shell
Parameter.Description: M-Shell - Radial distance of the intersection between the magnetic field line and themagnetic equator

Parameter.Name: M-Shell colatitude
Parameter.Description: Colatitude (S3RH) of the intersection between the magnetic field line and themagnetic equator

Parameter.Name: M-Shell longitude
Parameter.Description: Longitude (S3RH) of the intersection between the magnetic field line and themagnetic equator

Parameter.Name: curvilinear distance s
Parameter.Description: Curvilinear distance along the magnetic field line between the magnetic equator and the spacecraft
